summary: A young man shows his millionaire grandfather a film based on Molière's Tartuffe, in order to expose the old man's hypocritical governess who covets his own inheritance.
cast: Hermann Picha|Rosa Valetti|André Mattoni|Werner Krauss|Lil Dagover|Lucie Höflich|Emil Jannings|Camilla Horn
keywords: character name as title|tartuffe character|two word title|expressionist|expressionism
title: El hipócrita
